programme.title: Japan's economy, Louise Woodward and homosexuality
programme.short_synopsis: The US intervenes to help Japan's economy and Louise Woodward returns to England.
programme.medium_synopsis: US intervention in Japan's economy, Louise Woodward returns to the UK after her life sentence is reduced and Republican Trent Lott calls homosexuality a sin on national TV.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
